name: mamallama

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mama llama
Developer Terms of Use
des:
In this game, you will meet a baby llama named Maria that loves her llama mama. Maria will ask you to guess how many mama llamas showed up in your backyard. You can guess between 0 and 100 mamas. You will continue to guess higher or lower until you get it correct! How fast can you guess it? 

There are fun llama sounds build into the game. The game is fun for all ages, especially if you like animals!!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
